Question
========

According to CBS, the average size of jobs among married women in the Netherlands was 0.7 FTE (full-time equivalent). The distribution of this size is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 0.3 fte. You take a random sample of 36 married women. What is the standard error of the mean size in this distribution?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.05 fte
* 0.30 fte
* 0.40 fte
* 0.70 fte

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.05 fte: Correct
* 0.30 fte: Incorrect
* 0.40 FTE: Incorrect
* 0.70 FTE: Incorrect
